data.title: AI helps drive record $11.8 billion in Black Friday online spending
data.description: AI tools powered a record Black Friday online spending spree in the US, reaching $11.8 billion. Globally, AI influenced $14.2 billion in sales. Shoppers used chatbots to find deals, bypassing crowded stores. Despite higher prices, consumers spent more online. This surge sets the stage for an even bigger Cyber Monday.
data.keywords: Black Friday online spending,AI shopping tools,record online sales,U.S. retail trends,tariff price hikes
